Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Alley Oop's Clam Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz and Alley Oop and establishes their relationship through a rescue and an immediate debt confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's 'Drowning' and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz stages a drowning, is rescued by Alley Oop, and then immediately confronted about a debt.

sub_scenes.title: The Unpaid Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Immediately following the rescue, Alley Oop confronts King Guz about an old debt, revealing a possible ulterior motive for the rescue.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Acquisition and Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's journey to replace his old dinosaur, Bronto Soreness, culminating in the purchase of a new, smaller dinosaur and a farewell to the old one.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto Soreness's Ailment and Travel
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and Bronto Soreness are traveling, but Bronto Soreness's clumsiness becomes apparent.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Diagnosis and Trade-in Suggestion
sub_scenes.description: Bronto Soreness's tree-bumping is diagnosed as old age, leading to the suggestion of trading him in.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and another character arrive at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership to explore new dinosaur options.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Deal at the Dinosaur Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop is offered a test drive of a smaller dinosaur, which leads to a purchase despite an incident during the test drive.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Old Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: The old dinosaur is emotionally depicted as Alley Oop and another caveman bid farewell, followed by the old dinosaur being marked down for sale at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

sub_scenes.title: Instructions for the New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop receives instructions on how to handle his new dinosaur, setting up potential future events related to its use.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misadventures and The Twitch Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various romantic entanglements, misunderstandings, and comedic situations, alongside the introduction and consequences of a dance craze called 'the twitch'.

sub_scenes.title: New Dinosaur Mishaps and Dinny's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop experiences initial mishaps with the new dinosaur, leading to Dinny's critical reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense and Charge
sub_scenes.description: Dinny reacts angrily to perceived mistreatment and defends his dinosaur, leading to a charge towards children.

sub_scenes.title: Ooola and Alley Breakup
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Ooola fishing, but her rejection leads to accusations and a breakup.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: A fishing trip becomes a stage for misogynistic complaints and humorous interactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition and Flirtation
sub_scenes.description: Competition for Oola's affection arises, showcasing flirtation and jealous reactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Misunderstanding Fight
sub_scenes.description: A jealous confrontation leads to a fight based on misunderstanding, which is later clarified.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lessons
sub_scenes.description: A smaller caveman attempts to teach a muscular caveman about romance, leading to humorous analogies and hesitant agreement.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gifts and Crocodile
sub_scenes.description: Romantic gestures are made with flowers and a leafy branch, leading to competition and a crocodile confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Assorted Scenes: Vulgar Tree Climbing and Flashback Anger
sub_scenes.description: Brief scenes showcasing diverse reactions and emotions, including vulgarity, past anger, and romantic tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Tensions and Cowardice Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Scenes depicting romantic possessiveness, accusations of cowardice, and protection from a perceived cannibal.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Romantic New Leaf
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of infidelity lead to physical violence and a subsequent attempt at romantic change.

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Dangers
sub_scenes.description: The 'twitch' dance craze is introduced, showing its comical and dangerous effects, including injuries and social pressure to participate.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel and Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel for historical research, leading to an accidental trip to the present and subsequent return to ancient Spain, culminating in a comedic bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel for Research
sub_scenes.description: Scientists plan time travel to research 16th-century Spain, seeking firsthand knowledge.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Prehistoric Kiss and Accidental Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Oola's romantic moment is interrupted by accidental time travel to the present.

sub_scenes.title: 20th Century and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: In the 20th century, Wonmug reveals the reason for bringing Alley and Oola forward in time – a research assignment in Spain, but they are promptly sent back.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain

sub_scenes.title: Back to Ancient Spain and Buster's Serenade
sub_scenes.description: Back in ancient Spain, Buster's loud serenade leads to conflict and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment
The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony

sub_scenes.title: Buster's Bullfight Novelty Act
sub_scenes.description: Buster's actions lead to a bullfight delay, and he unexpectedly becomes a 'novelty' bullfighter, comically defeating the bull.

narrative_arcs.title: The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity
Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act
Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Accusations and King for a Day
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features romantic jealousy and accusations alongside the humorous scenario of 'King for a Day' and its unexpected consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Impatience and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Romantic impatience and accusations of infidelity arise, creating personal drama.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Introduction and Setup
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' concept is introduced, setting up the premise and initial scenarios of temporary kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: New King and Crowd Rejection
sub_scenes.description: The new king's reign begins with public rejection and chaos, revealing a manipulative scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification

sub_scenes.title: King's Isolation and Former King's Satisfaction
sub_scenes.description: The new king faces isolation, while the former king expresses satisfaction with his manipulated scenario.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Bon-bons and Ulcer Pills
sub_scenes.description: Guz's leisurely enjoyment of 'bon-bons' is humorously revealed to be ulcer pills, leading to a domestic dispute with the Queen over dirty feet.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust
True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

sub_scenes.title: Rum-Pus Cheating and Clam Dispute
sub_scenes.description: A dispute over cheating at 'rum-pus' escalates into a fight over found clams, resolved by the Wise Man's unconventional method.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation
Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Commotions and Dining Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays various disruptions and humorous incidents within the royal setting, from recurring fights to dining with health concerns and sudden attacks.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Fights and Financial Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Recurring fights and accusations of financial dishonesty disrupt the royal setting.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dinner and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: Dinner is announced, focusing on the crowned man's anticipation for dinosaur and subsequent health warnings.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Diet and Peek-a-boo Attack
sub_scenes.description: The crowned man's healthy eating due to his ulcer is comically interrupted by a violent attack.

Major_Arcs.title: Assorted Scenarios: Apologies, Rulership, and Barberous Acts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a collection of diverse and loosely connected scenarios, including apologies, leadership propositions, strange occurrences, and a 'barberous' act.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies: Oompa and Pal
sub_scenes.description: Two separate apology scenarios occur, showcasing remorse and attempts at reconciliation.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Return to Citizen Status and Ruler Proposition
sub_scenes.description: A character rejoices at returning to a normal life, followed by Alley Oop's proposition for someone to become a ruler.

sub_scenes.title: Board Measurement and Fortune Telling Setup
sub_scenes.description: A seemingly practical scene of board measurement is juxtaposed with the setup for fortune telling and romantic prophecy.

sub_scenes.title: Barberous Act: Forced Shaving
sub_scenes.description: The 'barberous act' is revealed to be forced shaving, starting with a setup and concluding with the act itself.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment and Roman Soldier
sub_scenes.description: A scientist's time machine experiment goes awry, unexpectedly bringing a Roman soldier to the present.
